1385860.name: Lair of the Clockwork God: A Soundtrack for the End of Everything
1385860.description:
This is more than just a soundtrack.

1. The full OST from Lair of the Clockwork God
2. A brand new album "The Tribulations of Matt C."
3. The Devil's Kiss OST

This is all the music for Lair of the Clockwork God revisited, rearranged and remastered into something you can actually listen to.

This is music from pre-production, cut music and never-before-heard variants of existing tracks, polished up and finished for your listening pleasure.

This is music freshly crafted, to expand and explore the Dan and Ben multiverse, and bring a little more depth to the tragedy of Matt C.

Master craftsman Tobey Evans compels you to join him in an auditory journey unlike anything you've ever heard before, in THREE amazing albums.
